archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0716
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a collections manager, I want customers in collections to have their interest free device blocked after a certain timeframe, so that they can't use it if they leave us and don't pay.

properties.value: Part of collection process, dedicated workshop collection. VFNZ AP: Please check what kind of actions are legal for interest free devices.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
